TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Surgery to remove the prostate in which an attempt is made to save the nerves that help cause penile erections.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "nerve-sparing radical prostatectomy"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "prostatectomía radical preservadora de nervios"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cirugía para extirpar la próstata tratando de salvar los nervios que ayudan a producir las erecciones del pene.
